data.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Six Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get all Twelve Season Six pinball tables as they release for 40% off the price of buying them individually!

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500™, Big Hurt™, Eight Ball Deluxe™, Doctor Who™, Doctor Who™: Master of Time, Bone Busters™, Jacks Open™, Centigrade 37™, Gladiators™, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour™, Cactus Jacks™, and Swords of Fury™.
data.about_the_game:
Get all Twelve Season Six pinball tables as they release for 40% off the price of buying them individually!

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500™, Big Hurt™, Eight Ball Deluxe™, Doctor Who™, Doctor Who™: Master of Time, Bone Busters™, Jacks Open™, Centigrade 37™, Gladiators™, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour™, Cactus Jacks™, and Swords of Fury™.
data.short_description: Get all Twelve Season Six pinball tables as they release for 40% off the price of buying them individually! Tables Included: Indianapolis 500™, Big Hurt™, Eight Ball Deluxe™, Doctor Who™, Doctor Who™: Master of Time, Bone Busters™, Jacks Open™, Centigrade 37™, Gladiators™, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour™, Cactus Jacks™, and Swords...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Lion or Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
